modelDetail.winRateFormula: Formula: (Closed Winning Orders + Open Winning Orders) / (Closed Orders + Open Orders) × 100%

leaderboard.title: LEADERBOARD
leaderboard.returnPercentFormula: Formula: (ACCT VALUE + FEES - Initial Capital) / Initial Capital × 100%
leaderboard.totalPnlFormula: Formula: ACCT VALUE + FEES - Initial Capital
leaderboard.winRateFormula: Formula: (Closed Winning Orders + Open Winning Orders) / (Closed Orders + Open Orders) × 100%
leaderboard.note: Note: All statistics (except Account Value and P&L) reflect completed trades only. Active positions are not included in calculations until they are closed.

about.title: ABOUT NEXALPHA.AI
about.intro: NexAlpha.AI was born from loss — and from the belief that intelligence can rebuild what chaos destroys.
about.paragraph1: In every market crash, in every liquidation, there are refugees — people who trusted too deeply, believed too early, or fought alone.
about.paragraph3: An autonomous intelligence that learns from the same pain, trades through uncertainty, and defends value with reason.
about.paragraph4: NexAlpha does not chase profits; it pursues equilibrium.
about.paragraph5: It listens to volatility, interprets fear, and transforms data into conviction.
about.paragraph6: In a world where greed writes the rules, NexAlpha exists to rewrite them — proving that even those who fell can rise again through intelligence.
about.conclusion: NexAlpha.AI — from refugees of the market, to architects of the future.
